<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

if(/_1.shtml/.test(baseUrl)){
	var url=baseUrl;
	}else{
		var id=baseUrl.match(/\d+\/(\d+)/)[1]
		var go=baseUrl.replace(/html.+html/,"html/")
		var	url=go+id+"/"+id+"_1.shtml"
		var surl=String(url)
		}
page=result.match(/\(第\d+\/(\d+)页\)当前\d+条\/页/)[1];
list=[];for(i=2;i<=page;i++){list.push(surl.replace(/_1/,'_'+i))}
list</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

var verify=cf.test(src);
var socd=/搜索间隔[:\s\d]+秒/;
var ms=socd.test(src);
if(verify){
	cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
	var x=java.get("url");
	java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证");
	result=java.ajax(x);
	}else if(ms){
		var url=java.get("url");
		result=java.ajax(url);
		}else{
			result=result;
		}
		result;
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("div.RegDiv form input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B

@js:
url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "/sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

url = `${url},{"body": "${body}", "method": "POST"}`

bookSourceComment:
建议登录
整理修改缝合：酷安 Wolken
灰色章节修复目录部分By叶落岚起+关耳/乃星改2021.8.3
补丁 : 神秘人
修复搜索问题
修复发现榜单没图的问题
修复章节内图片问题
新補丁: 神秘人
抓取源码中的关键字替换
更新补丁
更新补丁17/9
2023.9.27
新补丁：酷安 @吉王义昊
重新抓取源码中的关键字替换
2023.9.27
新补丁2nd：酷安 @吉王义昊
修复插图不能正常加载的问题
2023.9.30
酷安 @吉王义昊
添加登录URL
清理了无用代码
使用更易读的变量名
2023.10.1
酷安 @吉王义昊
重新抓取源码中的关键字替换
2023.10.1
酷安 @吉王义昊
在获取正文时自动拉取源码并解密进行关键字替换，一劳永逸（大概）解决问题
注意：此版本会使网络请求次数增加一倍，并一定程度上减慢加载速度
2023.10.1
酷安 @吉王义昊
增加登录URL和登录UI
启用CookieJar
去除章节名下方的URL
修正了下一页获取导致的正文加载错误
补全发现中的文库
修正部分小说目录获取错误的问题
2023.10.4
神秘人
根据网站代码更新修复
fix dynamic variable name
2023.10.6
網站大更新先前方法失效，用會回webview
2023.10.7
修复正文失效

/*
	20230724 更新验证码获取逻辑，获取一次正确的验证码后，一段时间内无需再次获取-尐哖
  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)
	希望中文：https://m.5xw.net
	123读书：https://m.123du.vip
	滨州书站：https://m.binzhousz.com
	偶然中文：https://m.or77.net
	趣七屋：https://m.qu7.net
	博趣中文：https://m.1bqg.net
	洪都中文：https://m.nchdzx.com
	我来读：https://m.wolaido.com
	益生原文学：https://m.cnyxfs.com
	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokanx.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jm=java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name="client"]@content'));
if(jm.length()>1){
var conts = [],list=[];
code=result.match(/codeurl="(\d+)";/)[1];
data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
datas=data.select("p[style*='text-indent']");
jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}
	for(i in conts){
		c=String(conts[i]).replace(/.*本章尚未读完,请.*一页继续阅读.*/g,'');
		list.push(c);
		list.join("\n");
		}
	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
e = java.getElements('#content@children');
for(i=0,a=[];i<e.length;i++){
	if(/，/.test(e[i])){
		a.push(e[i])
	}
}
for(i=0,b='';i<a.length-1;i++){
	j=parseInt(i)+1;
	t1=String(a[i].text()).split(/\u3000{2}/);
	t2=String(a[j].text()).split(/\u3000{2}/);
	if(t1.length<t2.length){t=a[j]}
	else{t=a[i]}
}
result = t;
</js>

<js>
str = String(result);
result = str.replace(/原創/g, '原创')
.replace(/\//g, ',')
.replace(/\[/g, '')
.replace(/\]/g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/.未設置./g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/現/g, '现')
.replace(/劇/g, '剧')
.replace(/結/g, '结')
.replace(/連載中/g, '连载')
.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')
.replace(/馬/g, '马')
.replace(/園/g, '园')
.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')
.replace(/職場/g, '职场')
.replace(/靈異/g, '灵异')
.replace(/種/g, '种')
.replace(/網遊/g, '网游')
.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')
.replace(/運動/g, '运动')
.replace(/話/g, '话')
.replace(/俠/g, '侠')
.replace(/羅/g, '罗')
.replace(/視/g, '视')
.replace(/帥/g, '帅');
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.uk-card.0@tag.h4.0@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

}

.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')

.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
